snippet.title: Disaster Blaster - Updated Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Disaster Blaster is a roguelite card game where you, as a mad scientist, build an automatic weapon using a wide variety of cards to create the most devastating arsenal in the universe. Boost damage, multiply bullets, and add explosive or electrifying effects as your weapon annihilates waves of enemies: it's all in your hands!

#indiegame #gaming #gameplay #indiegames #roguelike 

WISHLIST NOW DISASTER BLASTER ON STEAM! Check the links on our channel page.
